content.text:
I'm ready to help you explore the codebase and design implementation plans for Sentiment-Curator. I understand that I'm in READ-ONLY mode and will only explore the codebase without making any modifications.

Let me start by understanding the project structure:

<read_file>
<path>C:\Users\jaewoong\Desktop\project\Sentiment-Curator\README.md</path>
</read_file>

<read_file>
<path>C:\Users\jaewoong\Desktop\project\Sentiment-Curator\docs\TECH_STACK.md</path>
</read_file>

<bash>
<command>cd "C:\Users\jaewoong\Desktop\project\Sentiment-Curator" && find . -type f -name "*.md" | head -20</command>
</bash>

<bash>
<command>cd "C:\Users\jaewoong\Desktop\project\Sentiment-Curator" && ls -la</command>
</bash>

I'm ready to explore the codebase and help you design implementation plans. Please provide me with:
1. The specific requirements you'd like me to work on
2. Any particular perspective or approach you'd like me to take during the design process

I'll thoroughly explore the codebase, understand the existing patterns, and create a detailed implementation plan for you.
